title: Services update from the psychological counseling center
author: 陳奕錚
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 心理諮商輔導中心 - 陳奕錚 - yjchen92@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話(03)890-6894
對象： 全校學生
標題： Services update from the psychological counseling center
日期： Tue, 9 Apr 2024 11:33:52 +0800
附檔： 240409 中心公告(EMG).png (294 KB)   
Dear all at National Dong Hwa University,

The psychological counseling center is still open during online courses from April 4th to April 26th, for your psychological wellbeing after the 0403 Hualien earthquake.

The services of counseling center are as follows:

I. Face-to-face Individual counseling sessions and single consultations at counseling center will remain as before. Those who need consultations can make a phone call, email or come to counseling center in person to make an appointment.

II. The consultation center plans a series of post-quake mental health and wellbeing activities, including online and physical activities. Please go to the center's website to find relevant information and sign up for the cross-domain independent learning system.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us, thank you.

Warm Regards,
Psychological Counseling Center
